weekly_top_story.headline: Canada’s Mikael Kingsbury wins first gold medal of 2026 Winter Olympics in moguls
weekly_top_story.summary: Mikael Kingsbury, dubbed the 'King of Moguls,' secured Canada’s first gold at the 2026 Winter Olympics, highlighting national sporting excellence and boosting morale amid global tensions.

stories.headline: China drops visa requirement for Canadian tourists, business visitors
stories.summary: China has eliminated visa requirements for Canadian tourists and business travelers, easing travel restrictions and potentially boosting bilateral economic and tourism ties.

stories.headline: Air Canada suspends flights to Cuba amid fuel shortage
stories.summary: Air Canada has halted all flights to Cuba due to a severe fuel shortage, stranding thousands of Canadian travelers and underscoring Cuba's deepening economic crisis with ripple effects on North American tourism.
